title: Ep 527 | How Jase Controlled His Anger for 30 Years & Update On Mia's Recovery
description:
Jase explains how he was able to successfully manage his anger for 30 years. Zach talks about his 20s and his misunderstanding of what faith really was, and he shares the book that helped clear it up. Jase thoroughly reviews the movie "Noah" — and gives Hollywood a pass on it. And Phil discusses how much he loves that NOTHING was a surprise to God ... not even sin.

https://Talkshop.live/watch/kNa2Qoub38oD — The ONLY place to get your signed copy of "Your Daily Phil" by Phil Robertson

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Go to https://PrepareWithPhil.com and save $50 on your Four-Week Emergency Food Kit

Go to https://SuperBeets.com/PHIL for up to 45% off plus free shipping
